channel.title: Cybersecurity Solutions on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Cybersecurity Solutions on FinanClub

item.title: S
item.description: score:-54 Chances: SentinelOne leads the way in XDR. SentinelOne and Netskope team up to secure modern workforce. SentinelOne streamlines vulnerability management with Singularity™ Ranger Insights. SentinelOne launches cloud data security product line. SentinelOne bolsters India’s cyber defenses. Risks: Cybersecurity startup Wiz considers potential bid for SentinelOne.

item.title: GEN
item.description: score:1182 Chances: Gen Digital experiences a gain with positive Earnings Per Share (EPS). Gen Digital offers cybersecurity solutions, identity protection, and privacy solutions. Gen Digital’s Q1 results show strong customer growth, global expansion benefits, and Avast acquisition impact. Gen Digital releases its fiscal year 2024 first-quarter results.
